author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Cipher Mining Begins Bitcoin Production at 300 MW Black Pearl Data Center
description: The New York-based miner expects hashrate to hit 23 EH/s by Q3 after starting operations at its Black Pearl site.
content:
Cipher Mining (CIFR) has begun bitcoin 
 production at its 300-megawatt (MW) Black Pearl facility in Texas, the company announced on Monday. The launch marks a key milestone for the firm, which now … [+1037 chars]
